name: Dinomite (Mauro Vanetti, stefyaya252, Mattmos99, RAFFAELE TETI)
name_original: Dinomite (Mauro Vanetti, stefyaya252, Mattmos99, RAFFAELE TETI)
description:
This is just a prototype made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2021.
It's an online game for 2, 3 or 4 players. Ask your friends to visit this page to connect to the first open room.

Rules:

  • Escape mother dinosaur.
  • Who holds the egg for longer, wins.
  • But who hold the egg when the time is over, loses.

Controls:

Arrow keys - Movement
N - Network stats
F5 - Refresh the page if the connection fails or you want to play again.

Cheats:

M - Unlock the Start button for solo play.
K - Kick out everyone.
